channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flying at bins 1 graduate place, 11th June
item.description:
The road sweeper never sweeps near these bins in the road. The is constant flytipping here and it's been retorted dozens of time and all n it needs is the road sweeper to do every day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wild's Rents, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obscuring view of road when exiting driveway, 11th June
item.description:
The lower part of the tree has gown outwards and is making it unsafe to see oncoming vehicles and pedestrians when exiting the driveway of number of 15.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westfield Road, Barnehurst, London

item.title: Overgrown bushes. Can’t get through path with wheelchair, 11th June
item.description:
This has been overgrown for a while. It’s now out of hand and can’t get past on foot, let alone on wheel chair

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 56, Lingfield Crescent, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree, 11th June
item.description:
This tree is clearly too large for the space it is in, this tree has not been cut/trimmed for years within where the borough comes round and cut trees, it appears to be actually touch the house it is in front of, this must be causing owners issues and could potentially be damaging the footings of their house with the roots of the tree, this tree is in need of serious pruning or removing all together as it is clearly planted to close to the property
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Courtland Grove, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain outside Evelyn Court causing overflowing sewage, 11th June
item.description:
For several months a drain has been blocked outside the flats, causing raw sewage to overflow onto the pavement and road. It smells terrible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evelyn Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Toilet, 11th June
item.description:

item.title: Pedestrian side of pavement completely blocked, 11th June
item.description:
The pedestrian side of the pavement is completely blocked where vegetation has grown out to cover the pavement and trees are overhanging very low, the cycle path is only just clear the vegetation is starting to spread into the cycle path. This is a danger to pedestrians as they have no safe path to walk on as the cyclist have right of way on their side of the path, but also for cyclists having to try to avoid pedestrians...this has been reported numerous times and nothing has been done to fix the issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Manorway, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
